events.message: I would like to request a refund for my recent purchase as the item does not meet my expectations and I am very disappointed.
The customer's request was reviewed and the case has been categorized under Refund due to their stated desire to return the product.
The case has been assigned to agent Maria S. who will handle the refund process for this customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request and will do my best to resolve it quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for requesting the refund so I can assist you better?
My order number is 789456123. The product arrived damaged and wasn't working as described, so I want to return it and get my money back.
Thank you for the information. I have processed your refund request and arranged for a prepaid return shipping label to be sent to your email shortly.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the help and will send the product back as soon as I get the label.
Your refund case is now marked as resolved. Please ship the product back using the label at your earliest convenience.
We just wanted to follow up and confirm whether you have received the return label and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the label and shipped the product back yesterday. Please let me know once the refund is applied.
The refund has been credited to your account. We are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to you via email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
